name.description: The name of the artist or band

dateAdded.description: Date this artist was added to the database (YYYY-MM-DD format)

dateUpdated.description: Date this entry was last updated (YYYY-MM-DD format), or null if never updated

comments.description: Additional notes or context about why this artist is considered AI-generated, or null if no comments

spotify.description: Spotify artist URL (use clean link), or null if not available

apple.description: Apple Music artist URL (prefer US link), or null if not available

youtube.description: YouTube channel URL, or null if not available

instagram.description: Instagram profile URL, or null if not available

tiktok.description: TikTok profile URL, or null if not available

amazon.description: Amazon profile URL, or null if not available

urls.description: Supporting evidence URLs (e.g., Reddit posts, blog articles, etc.)
